divs: Sighting DetailsI was at Brownwood state park near Brownwood Texas on the evening of Nov. 9, 2009 around 8 :00 pm I observed 10 to 15 very bright lights suddenly lighting up very high in the sky. The lights stayed lit for several seconds before fading out. The lights were slightly amber in color. They exhibited no signs of being a rocket-mounted or of having been launched or dropped, they were extremely stable. A few lit up at the same time. Shortly after seeing the lights two fighter jets circled the area 15 to 20 times then headed east.
Summary: Various spotlight like lights high in sky for several seconds then fade.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brownwood
There were no other sightings in Brownwood on or around November 9th 2009
